# Smasher (Ex)
## Overview
*Smasher (Ex)*: Once per rage, whenever the barbarian makes an attack against an unattended object or a sunder combat maneuver, she can ignore the objectâ€™s hardness. This ability must be used before the attack roll or sunder check is made.

**Source:** Advanced Player's Guide, pg. 76
